dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: It seems a feeble mortal has wandered into my domain. What do you want, insignificant being?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is a fleeting luxury. Mortals like you never appreciate the depth of our secrets.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Please, share your wisdom. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom is not something mortals can simply acquire. I'll entertain your pathetic plea.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to learn, not to challenge your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your reverence for knowledge is admirable, although your intentions remain suspicious.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time for games. Show me your power or prepare for a battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impudent mortal! You shall face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I demand respect and recognition of my presence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is earned, not demanded. Mortals like you seldom warrant acknowledgment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not one to be trifled with. Acknowledge my significance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your sense of self-importance is amusing, but I shall indulge your delusions for now.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a peaceful coexistence with your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful coexistence with a mortal? An absurd notion, truly. Yet, I shall consider it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your mockery will not go unpunished. Prepare for a confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such bravado from a mere mortal. Let us see if your actions match your words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not tolerate disrespect. Prepare to face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A mortal threatening a Shadow Demon? Bold move, indeed. Let us see if you can back it up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Engage in battle. I'll show you the extent of my power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your audacity is admirable, but your fate is sealed. Prepare for a demonstration of true darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave you be for now, but remember my warning.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fleeing like the coward you are? Wise choice, mortal. Your warning means nothing to me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking a challenge. Test me, demon.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A challenge, you say? Mortals always underestimate the power they face. Very well, let's see if you are worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to face any trial you throw at me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Confidence or foolishness? We shall soon find out. Prepare yourself for the darkness that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no darkness. Show me what you are capable of.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Let's see if your actions match your bravado.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense deception in your words. I will not continue down this path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Deception? You mortals think too highly of your intuitions. Your decision seals your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your challenges intrigue me, demon. I accept.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intrigued, are we? Let us see if your actions can match your words. Brace yourself for what's to come.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I embrace the challenge with open arms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An eager mortal, indeed. Your enthusiasm will soon meet the harsh reality of our confrontation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have changed my mind. I will not partake in this trial.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Changing your mind so easily? Mortals are truly fickle creatures. Your choice leads to a dead end.
